content.raw:
I'm getting a segfault when starting gzclient:

```
#0  0x00007ffff552ebd0 in QColor::alpha() const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#1  0x00007ffff54fa0e8 in QRasterPixmapData::fill(QColor const&) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#2  0x00007ffff6c0b4a8 in gazebo::gui::BuildingEditorPalette::BuildingEditorPalette (this=0x39b1c10, _parent=<optimized out>)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingEditorPalette.cc:137
#3  0x00007ffff6c03f74 in gazebo::gui::BuildingEditor::BuildingEditor (this=
    0x39d0270, _mainWindow=<optimized out>)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingEditor.cc:44
#4  0x000000000049561b in gazebo::gui::MainWindow::CreateEditors (this=
    0x19fe360) at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow.cc:1745
#5  0x000000000049fa56 in gazebo::gui::MainWindow::MainWindow (this=0x19fe360)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/MainWindow.cc:120
#6  0x000000000047d267 in gazebo::gui::load ()
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:245
#7  0x000000000047d3bc in gazebo::gui::run (_argc=1, _argv=0x7fffffffde48)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc:277
#8  0x000000000044ffa9 in main (_argc=<optimized out>, _argv=<optimized out>)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/main.cc:23
```
I'm double checking now that it is not a problem on my local machine.

I'm getting a segfault when starting gzclient:

#0  0x00007ffff552ebd0 in QColor::alpha() const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingEditorPalette.cc:137
